author: AP
title: Agent: NFL star Von Miller has COVID-19, is in good spirits
description: Agent: NFL star Von Miller has COVID-19, is in good spirits
content:
AURORA, Colorado (AP) — Von Miller’s agent says the NFL star has tested positive for the coronavirus and wanted to come forward with his diagnosis to show doubters how serious the disease is.
Joby Branion told The Associated Press on Thursday that Miller is … [+354 chars]
